snippet: Legislative leaders on Friday accused an opposition lawmaker of using a visit to Washington to urge the United States to meddle in Russia’s internal affairs.
abstract: Russian legislative leaders accuse opposition lawmaker Dmitry Gudkov of treason, saying he had used visit to Washington to urge United States to meddle in Russia's internal affairs.
lead_paragraph: Legislative leaders on Friday accused an opposition lawmaker of using a visit to Washington to urge the United States to meddle in Russia’s internal affairs.

headline.seo: Russian Legislator Accused of Treason After U.S. Visit
headline.main: Russian Legislator Accused of Treason After U.S. Visit
headline.print_headline: Russian Lawmaker Accused of Treason After Trip
